TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5481=I bought this Mac Book Pro 15 inch,2 Ghz intel Core i7, 8 GB RAM in March 2011.I have noticed recently bottom left and middle side getting overheated and not able to hold it in my lap.I have Aperture,Photoshop CS5.Any ideas whats going wrong??.I have taken 3 yr warranty.You think, this problem will be covered in my warranty? Any suggestions/help is really appreciated.Thank you. Venkata}
